name: Indecision App
description: This app allows a user to input a list of options and select an option at random.

name: TrekTrak
description: A simple app for creating a travel journal/blog about your adventures. Includes user authorization and authentication.

name: Memory Match Game
description: This is a simple card based memory game in which you flip over cards, revealing various images on the other side, and attempt to find matching pairs.

name: Clicky Game
description: A simple game in which you attempt to click each unique image without clicking on any of them more than once!

name: Crystal Clicker
description: This is a simple game of hidden numbers and a math puzzle that can be played in your web browser.

name: Giftastic
description: An app that pulls various gifs from the giphy API based on keywords that can be submitted by the user.
